language.select_help: Choose your preferred language for the interface

fetch.title: Fetch Models Metadata
fetch.content: Click the Fetch button to download model metadata and preview images from Civitai.

download.title: Download New Models
download.content: Use the Download button to download models directly from Civitai URLs.

bulk.title: Bulk Operations
bulk.content: Enter bulk mode by clicking this button or pressing B. Select multiple models and perform batch operations. Use Ctrl+A to select all visible models.

searchOptions.title: Search Options
searchOptions.content: Click this button to configure what fields to search in: filename, model name, tags, or creator name. Customize your search scope.

filter.title: Filter Models
filter.content: Use filters to narrow down models by base model type (SD1.5, SDXL, Flux, etc.) or by specific tags.

breadcrumb.title: Breadcrumb Navigation
breadcrumb.content: The breadcrumb navigation shows your current path and allows quick navigation between folders. Click any folder name to jump directly there.

modelCards.title: Model Cards
modelCards.content: Single-click a model card to view detailed information and edit metadata. Look for the pencil icon when hovering over editable fields.

contextMenu.title: Context Menu
contextMenu.content: Right-click any model card for a context menu with additional actions.

actions.sendToWorkflow: Send to ComfyUI (Click: Append, Shift+Click: Replace)

sendToWorkflow.checkpointNotImplemented: Send checkpoint to workflow - feature to be implemented
sendToWorkflow.missingPath: Unable to determine model path for this card

exampleImages.noRemoteImagesAvailable: No remote example images available for this model on Civitai

downloadExampleImages.label: Download example images
downloadExampleImages.missingPath: Set a download location before downloading example images.
downloadExampleImages.unavailable: Example image downloads aren't available yet. Try again after the page finishes loading.

cleanupExampleImages.label: Clean up example image folders
cleanupExampleImages.success: Moved {count} folder(s) to the deleted folder
cleanupExampleImages.none: No example image folders needed cleanup
cleanupExampleImages.error: Failed to clean example image folders: {message}

search.notAvailable: Search not available on statistics page

settings.civitaiApiKeyHelp: Used for authentication when downloading models from Civitai

contentFiltering.showOnlySfwHelp: Filter out all NSFW content when browsing and searching

videoSettings.autoplayOnHoverHelp: Only play video previews when hovering over them

layoutSettings.displayDensityHelp: Choose how many cards to display per row:
layoutSettings.displayDensityWarning: Warning: Higher densities may cause performance issues on systems with limited resources.
layoutSettings.cardInfoDisplayHelp: Choose when to display model information and action buttons
layoutSettings.modelCardFooterActionHelp: Choose what the bottom-right card button does
layoutSettings.modelNameDisplayHelp: Choose what to display in the model card footer

folderSettings.activeLibraryHelp: Switch between configured libraries to update default folders. Changing the selection reloads the page.
folderSettings.defaultLoraRootHelp: Set the default LoRA root directory for downloads, imports and moves
folderSettings.defaultCheckpointRootHelp: Set the default checkpoint root directory for downloads, imports and moves
folderSettings.defaultEmbeddingRootHelp: Set the default embedding root directory for downloads, imports and moves

priorityTags.title: Priority Tags
priorityTags.description: Customize the tag priority order for each model type (e.g., character, concept, style(toon|toon_style))

validation.missingClosingParen: Entry {index} is missing a closing parenthesis.
validation.missingCanonical: Entry {index} must include a canonical tag name.
validation.duplicateCanonical: The canonical tag "{tag}" appears more than once.

downloadPathTemplates.title: Download Path Templates
downloadPathTemplates.help: Configure folder structures for different model types when downloading from Civitai.
downloadPathTemplates.baseModelPathMappingsHelp: Customize folder names for specific base models (e.g., "Flux.1 D" → "flux")

validation.leadingTrailingSlash: Cannot start or end with slash

exampleImages.downloadLocationPlaceholder: Enter folder path for example images
exampleImages.downloadLocationHelp: Enter the folder path where example images from Civitai will be saved
exampleImages.autoDownloadHelp: Automatically download example images for models that don't have them (requires download location to be set)
exampleImages.optimizeImagesHelp: Optimize example images to reduce file size and improve loading speed (metadata will be preserved)

misc.includeTriggerWords: Include Trigger Words in LoRA Syntax
misc.includeTriggerWordsHelp: Include trained trigger words when copying LoRA syntax to clipboard

metadataArchive.enableArchiveDbHelp: Use a local database to access metadata for models that have been deleted from Civitai.
metadataArchive.managementHelp: Download or remove the metadata archive database
metadataArchive.downloadError: Failed to download metadata archive database
metadataArchive.removeError: Failed to remove metadata archive database
metadataArchive.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove the metadata archive database? This will delete the local database file and you'll need to download it again to use this feature.

proxySettings.enableProxyHelp: Enable custom proxy settings for this application, overriding system proxy settings
proxySettings.proxyTypeHelp: Select the type of proxy server (HTTP, HTTPS, SOCKS4, SOCKS5)
proxySettings.proxyHostHelp: The hostname or IP address of your proxy server
proxySettings.proxyPortHelp: The port number of your proxy server

refresh.title: Refresh model list
refresh.quickTooltip: Scan for new or missing model files so the list stays current.
refresh.fullTooltip: Reload all model details from metadata files—use if the library looks out of date or after manual edits.

updates.title: Show models with updates available
updates.checkTooltip: Checking updates may take a while.

import.title: Import a recipe from image or URL
import.urlSectionDescription: Input a Civitai image URL or local file path to import as a recipe.
import.uploadSectionDescription: Upload an image with LoRA metadata to import as a recipe.
import.useDefaultPathTooltip: When enabled, files are automatically organized using configured path templates
import.folderPathPlaceholder: Type folder path or select from tree below...
import.earlyAccessRequired: This LoRA requires early access payment to download.
import.verifyEarlyAccess: Verify that you have purchased early access before downloading.
import.duplicateRecipesFound: {count} identical recipe(s) found in your library
import.duplicateRecipesDescription: These recipes contain the same LoRAs with identical weights.

errors.enterUrlOrPath: Please enter a URL or file path
errors.selectLoraRoot: Please select a LoRA root directory

copyRecipe.missingId: Cannot copy recipe: Missing recipe ID

sendRecipe.missingId: Cannot send recipe: Missing recipe ID
sendRecipe.failed: Failed to send recipe to workflow

viewLoras.missingId: Cannot view LoRAs: Missing recipe ID
viewLoras.noLorasFound: No LoRAs found in this recipe

downloadMissing.missingId: Cannot download LoRAs: Missing recipe ID
downloadMissing.getInfoFailed: Failed to get information for missing LoRAs

sidebar.recursiveUnavailable: Recursive search is available in tree view only

dragDrop.unableToResolveRoot: Unable to determine destination path for move.

download.title: Download Model from URL
download.useDefaultPathTooltip: When enabled, files are automatically organized using configured path templates
download.pathPlaceholder: Type folder path or select from tree below...

errors.noVersions: No versions available for this model

deleteModel.title: Delete Model
deleteModel.message: Are you sure you want to delete this model and all associated files?

excludeModel.title: Exclude Model
excludeModel.message: Are you sure you want to exclude this model? Excluded models won't appear in searches or model lists.

deleteDuplicateRecipes.title: Delete Duplicate Recipes
deleteDuplicateRecipes.message: Are you sure you want to delete the selected duplicate recipes?

deleteDuplicateModels.title: Delete Duplicate Models
deleteDuplicateModels.message: Are you sure you want to delete the selected duplicate models?

clearCache.title: Clear Cache Files
clearCache.message: Are you sure you want to clear all cache files?
clearCache.description: This will remove all cached model data. The system will need to rebuild the cache on next startup, which may take some time depending on your model collection size.

bulkDelete.title: Delete Multiple Models
bulkDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete all selected models and their associated files?

bulkBaseModel.title: Set Base Model for Multiple Models

exampleAccess.title: Local Example Images
exampleAccess.message: No local example images found for this model. View options:

downloadOption.title: Download from Civitai
downloadOption.description: Save remote examples locally for offline use and faster loading

importOption.title: Import Your Own
importOption.description: Add your own custom examples for this model

exampleAccess.footerNote: Remote examples are still viewable in the model details even without local copies

moveModel.pathPlaceholder: Type folder path or select from tree below...

relinkCivitai.title: Re-link to Civitai
relinkCivitai.warningText: This is a potentially destructive operation. Re-linking will:
relinkCivitai.proceedText: Only proceed if you're sure this is what you want.

helpText.title: Paste any Civitai model URL. Supported formats:
helpText.note: Note: If no modelVersionId is provided, the latest version will be used.

metadata.notesHint: Press Enter to save, Shift+Enter for new line

triggerWords.label: Trigger Words
triggerWords.addPlaceholder: Type to add or click suggestions below

suggestions.noTrainedWords: No trained words or class tokens found in this model. You can manually enter trigger words.
suggestions.classTokenDescription: Add to your prompt for best results

versions.heading: Model versions
versions.copy: Track and manage every version of this model in one place.
versions.empty: No version history available for this model yet.
versions.missingModelId: This model is missing a Civitai model id.

confirm.delete: Delete this version from your library?

loras.title: Initializing LoRA Manager
loras.message: Scanning and building LoRA cache. This may take a few minutes...

checkpoints.title: Initializing Checkpoint Manager
checkpoints.message: Scanning and building checkpoint cache. This may take a few minutes...

embeddings.title: Initializing Embedding Manager
embeddings.message: Scanning and building embedding cache. This may take a few minutes...

recipes.title: Initializing Recipe Manager
recipes.message: Loading and processing recipes. This may take a few minutes...

statistics.title: Initializing Statistics
statistics.message: Processing model data for statistics. This may take a few minutes...

civitai.title: Civitai Integration
civitai.description: Connect your Civitai account: Visit Profile Avatar → Settings → API Keys → Add API Key, then paste it in Lora Manager settings.

download.title: Easy Download
download.description: Use Civitai URLs to quickly download and install new models.

recipes.title: Save Recipes
recipes.description: Create recipes to save your favorite model combinations for future use.

filter.title: Fast Filtering
filter.description: Filter models by tags or base model type using the filter button in the header.

search.title: Quick Search
search.description: Press Ctrl+F (Cmd+F on Mac) to quickly search within your current view.

help.identicalHashes: Identical hashes mean identical model files, even if they have different names or previews.
help.keepOne: Keep only one version (preferably with better metadata/previews) and safely delete the others.

lora.syntaxCopiedNoTriggerWords: LoRA syntax copied to clipboard (no trigger words found)
lora.syntaxCopiedWithTriggerWords: LoRA syntax with trigger words copied to clipboard
lora.syntaxCopiedWithTriggerWordGroups: LoRA syntax with trigger word groups copied to clipboard

workflow.noSupportedNodes: No supported target nodes found in workflow
workflow.loraFailedToSend: Failed to send LoRA to workflow
workflow.recipeFailedToSend: Failed to send recipe to workflow
workflow.noMatchingNodes: No compatible nodes available in the current workflow

exampleImages.failedToOpen: Failed to open example images folder

updateVlogs.title: Latest Updates
updateVlogs.playlistDescription: Watch all update videos showcasing the latest features and improvements.

update.title: Check for Updates
update.noChangelogAvailable: No detailed changelog available. Check GitHub for more information.
update.checkingMessage: Please wait while we check for the latest version.

completion.restartMessage: Please restart ComfyUI or LoRA Manager to apply update.
completion.reloadMessage: Make sure to reload your browser for both LoRA Manager and ComfyUI.

nightly.warning: Warning: Nightly builds may contain experimental features and could be unstable.

support.title: Support the Project
support.message: If you find LoRA Manager useful, I'd really appreciate your support! 🙌

feedback.title: Provide Feedback
feedback.description: Your feedback helps shape future updates! Share your thoughts:

sections.coffeeDescription: If you'd like to support my work directly:
sections.patronDescription: Support ongoing development with monthly contributions:
sections.wechatDescription: For users in China, you can support via WeChat:

support.footer: Thank you for using LoRA Manager! ❤️

general.pageInitFailed: Failed to initialize {pageType} page. Please reload.

versionMismatch.title: Application Update Detected
versionMismatch.content: Your browser is running an outdated version of LoRA Manager ({storedVersion}). The server has been updated to version {currentVersion}. Please refresh to ensure proper functionality.

communitySupport.title: Keep LoRA Manager Thriving with Your Support ❤️
communitySupport.content: LoRA Manager is a passion project maintained full-time by a solo developer. Your support on Ko-fi helps cover development costs, keeps new updates coming, and unlocks a license key for the LM Civitai Extension as a thank-you gift. Every contribution truly makes a difference.
